game.name: Planes, Bullets and Vodka
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 아케이드 게임의 황금 시대로 돌아가는 이 게임에서 절차적으로 생성된 터널을 통해 수천 명의 적을 피하면서 비행하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fly through danger filled procedurally generated tunnels, avoiding thousands of enemies, on this throwback to the golden age of arcade games.

reviewHighlights.text: Funny game & EZ to get all achievements 100%
It's really awesome game, I like the background music I just love to hear it so much exciting when I play this game I have so much fun so I recommende...
